mapper.insert: insert into t_exam_classroom (id, clrName, clrType, clrSize, clrState) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clrType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clrSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clrState,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, clrName, clrType, clrSize, clrState from t_exam_classroom
